name: Panzer Cavalcade '41
description:
Panzer Cavalcade '41 is a quickplaying (between 5-10 minutes) postcard game.

You’re in command of a German Armored formation, in 1941, during the early stages of Operation Barbarossa.

Game design: Serge Bettencourt
Art and graphic design: Nils Johansson.

Special thanks to Ganix Ugarte Aja!
@GanixU
